homeDescription1: Relocated from Bolivia to Uruguay with a strong determination to contribute as a Full Stack Developer. I have 2+ years of experience as a QA Software Engineer collaborating closely with the development team.
homeDescription2: With a background as an Electronics Engineer, complemented by building several real-world projects involving technologies such as Python, Javascript, React, Node.js and Docker, I'm excited about transitioning into a full-time career in software development.
